article_title: Obamacare Premium Hikes Are Much Bigger Than You've Been Told

article_metadata.description: Many credible sources have confirmed Obamacare rate increases will be in the double digits. However, these are gross premium hikes. Net premium hikes paid by enrollees are distorted by tax credits paid to insurers. These tax credits are so badly designed that they impose a ratchet effect causing net premium hikes greater than the gross premium hikes.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
